description: Source files implementing the AppGateway plugin for WPEFramework, including core classes and their implementations, used in the plugin's functionality within the project.

classes.name: AppGateway
classes.description: Main class representing the AppGateway plugin, responsible for initialization and management of plugin-specific logic.

classes.name: AppGatewayImplementation
classes.description: Implementation class handling core logic for the plugin, possibly implementing interfaces.

classes.name: AppGatewayResponderImplementation
classes.description: Class implementing response handling mechanisms for the plugin.

classes.name: Resolver
classes.description: Utility class responsible for resolving resources or dependencies within the plugin.

classes.name: Module
classes.description: Module management class, handling plugin module lifecycle and registration.

methods.name: AppGateway::initialize
methods.description: Initializes the AppGateway plugin, setting up necessary components.

methods.name: AppGatewayResponderImplementation::respond
methods.description: Handles incoming responses or requests for the plugin.
